title: WebRTC voice/video calling system
description: Implement peer-to-peer voice and video calling using WebRTC with Nostr for signaling. Exchange SDP offers/answers and ICE candidates through Nostr events.

title: Nostr signaling for WebRTC
description: Create custom Nostr event kinds for WebRTC signaling: SDP offer/answer exchange, ICE candidate sharing. Use p-tags for targeted peer communication.

title: Improve relay connection resilience
description: Add better reconnection logic, relay health monitoring, and fallback relay support. Consider adding relay discovery.

title: WebRTC peer connection manager
description: Build RTCPeerConnection wrapper for managing audio/video streams, handling connection state, and media device access.

title: Message encryption with NIP-04
description: Implement NIP-04 encrypted direct messages for private chats. Use shared secret from ECDH for AES encryption.

title: NIP-07 browser extension wallet support
description: Add support for NIP-07 compatible browser extensions (nos2x, Alby) to use existing Nostr identities instead of generating new keys.

title: Voice/video call UI components
description: Add call controls UI: mute/unmute, video on/off, end call. Display remote video stream and local preview.
